scripts.clean:build:sass: shx rm -rf dist/resources/sass && npm run build:sass
scripts.clean:build:html: shx rm -rf dist/resources/html && npm run build:html
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean:build:test: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm test && echo "Watching..." && concurrently --prefix "{time}-{pid}" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:html"
scripts.watch:test: npm run build && npm test && echo "Watching..." && concurrently --prefix "{time}-{pid}" "tsc-watch --onSuccess 'npm test'" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:html"
scripts.build:docs: typedoc --exclude '**/+(cli|launcher)/**/*.ts' --theme minimal --mode file --module commonjs --hideGenerator --name Gluon --readme README.md  --target 'ES6' --out docs src/typescript/engine
scripts.build:resources: concurrently --prefix "{time}-{pid}" "npm run build:html" "npm run build:sass" "npm run build:cli-resources"
scripts.build: concurrently --prefix "{time}-{pid}" "npm run build:ts" "npm run build:resources" "npm run build:docs"
